title: Year In Local News Review: Wind, Rainstorm Wreaks Havoc | Local News | caledonianrecord.com
text: 2023 wrapped up with warm temperatures, torrential rains, and high winds that wreaked havoc and damage across the North Country and Northeast Kingdom. The morning and afternoon of Dec. 18 blew trees down on power lines, scores of power outrages, and some rivers that would, by that evening, over-top their banks. kAm“(6 AC6EEJ >F49 925 EC66D 5@H? @?
